summary: Shim size calculator app that sums shim thicknesses by selected color-coded millimeter values.

existing_features.title: Create a shim size calculator UI that lets users add/remove shims by selecting from the provided color list and entering a quantity for each color, then computes the total shim stack thickness.

Hardcode the shim color-to-thickness mapping exactly as shown in the uploaded image and use it for all calculations: Amber=0.025mm, Purple=0.038mm, Red=0.051mm, Green=0.076mm, Tan=0.102mm, Blue=0.127mm, Matte=0.191mm, Brown=0.254mm, Black=0.318mm, Pink=0.381mm, Yellow=0.508mm, White=0.635mm, Coral=0.762mm.
Display calculated results with clear units and sensible rounding: show total thickness in millimeters (mm) and also show the per-color subtotal (quantity Ã— mm) for transparency.
Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the calculator (colors, typography, spacing, and layout) and use it consistently across the page; avoid a blue/purple-dominant palette.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a shim size calculator that adds selected shim colors and their corresponding mm values (as shown) to compute total thickness.

projectName: Shim size calculator using color-coded thickness values
